attributes.action: Bring Tony Danza Back to TV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Danza lit up our screens in the mid to late 80s with his wry smile and wise cracks in such great shows as Who's the Boss? and Single Bars, Single Women.  We feel it is the responsibility of the British Government to get Tony Danza back on our screens.  Bring Tony back.  Because without him, Sitcoms are a lonely place.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
